Chocolate.name: Chocolate
Chocolate.description: A delicious snack that stops players from getting hangry. Restore a player's health by 25%

Hamburger.name: Hamburger
Hamburger.description: Don't worry, you will burn off those extra calories by being stressed out. Restore a player's health by 50%

Timbits.name: Timbits
Timbits.description: Bite-size snacks. Great for sharing with your friends. Restore all players' health by 15%

Pizza.name: Pizza
Pizza.description: The go-to food for last-minute group cramming sessions. Restore all players' health by 30%

Soda.name: Soda
Soda.description: The perfect drink after a long day. Just don't drink too much if you care about your health. Decrease a player's stress by 25%

Milkshake.name: Milkshake
Milkshake.description: A deluxe drinks that you can enjoy while chilling with friends. Decrease a player's stress by 50%

Tea.name: Tea
Tea.description: A relaxing drink. Help you unwind and take a break. Decrease all players' stress by 15%

Gatorade.name: Gatorade
Gatorade.description: Stressed-out while studying with your friends? Have some Gatorade! Decrease all players' stress by 30%

FloppyDisk.name: Floppy Disk
FloppyDisk.description: Revive a player with power of Boomer Technology. Restore that player's health to 20%
